assets.description: A list of files which are simply copied into the package.

dest.description: Destination folder where distributable binaries of the Angular library are written (default: `dist`).

keepLifecycleScripts.description: Enable this to keep the 'scripts' section in package.json. Read the NPM Blog on 'Package install scripts vulnerability' â€“ http://blog.npmjs.org/post/141702881055/package-install-scripts-vulnerability

lib.description: Description of the library's entry point.

amdId.description: ID for AMD module. By default, uses a value derived from the entry point's module ID (i.e., name property in package.json)

cssUrl.description: Embed assets in css file using data URIs - see https://css-tricks.com/data-uris

entryFile.description: Entry file to the public API (default: `src/public_api.ts`).

flatModuleFile.description: Filename of the auto-generated flat module file (if empty, defaults to the package name as given in `package.json`).

styleIncludePaths.description: Any additional paths that should be used to resolve style imports

umdId.description: ID for the UMD bundle. By default, uses a value derived from the entry point's module ID (i.e., name property in package.json)

umdModuleIds.description: A map of external dependencies and their correspondent UMD module identifiers. Map keys are TypeScript / EcmaScript module identifiers. Map values are UMD module ids. The purpose of this map is to correctly bundle an UMD module file (with `rollup`). By default, `rxjs`, `tslib` and `@angular/*` dependency symbols are supported.

whitelistedNonPeerDependencies.description: A list of dependencies that are allowed in the 'dependencies' and 'devDependencies' section of package.json. Values in the list are regular expressions matched against npm package names.
